ccipReceive((bytes32,uint64,bytes,bytes,.details: Note ensure you check the msg.sender is the OffRampRouter.

completeRound(uint256).details: Complete round and start new one

params.roundId: The round ID to distribute prizes for
Round ID to select winners for

enterWithETH().details: Enter lottery with ETH (will be swapped to BONE using direct V4 interaction)

fundVRFWithLink(uint256).details: Fund the VRF with LINK tokens

params.amount: Amount of LINK to transfer for VRF funding

getBonePriceFromPool().details: Get BONE price from V4 pool

returns.bonePerEth: The amount of BONE tokens per 1 ETH

returns._0: Array of players in the current round

getETHAmountForEntry().details: Get current ETH amount needed for entry

returns.ethNeeded: ETH amount required for lottery entry

getETHNeededForBone(uint256).details: Calculate ETH needed for exact BONE amount using pool price

returns.ethNeeded: Amount of ETH required (with slippage buffer)

returns._0: Current pool key for Uniswap V4

returns.poolExists: Whether the pool exists and has liquidity
returns.sqrtPriceX96: Current sqrt price from the pool

returns.playerCount: Number of players in the round

getVRFFundingStatus().details: Get VRF funding status and information

returns.estimatedCostPerRequest: Estimated LINK cost per VRF request
returns.requestsAffordable: Number of requests affordable with current balance
returns.sufficientFunds: Whether contract has sufficient LINK for next request

isETHAmountSufficient(uint256).details: Check if ETH amount is sufficient for entry

returns._0: bool True if amount is sufficient

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

setChainContract(uint64,address).details: Set chain contract for cross-chain functionality

params.chainSelector: Chain selector for the target chain
params.contractAddress: Contract address on the target chain

params._numWords: Number of random words to request

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Should indicate whether the contract implements IAny2EVMMessageReceiver. e.g. return interfaceId == type(IAny2EVMMessageReceiver).interfaceId || interfaceId == type(IERC165).interfaceId This allows CCIP to check if ccipReceive is available before calling it. - If this returns false or reverts, only tokens are transferred to the receiver. - If this returns true, tokens are transferred and ccipReceive is called atomically. Additionally, if the receiver address does not have code associated with it at the time of execution (EXTCODESIZE returns 0), only tokens will be transferred.

returns._0: true if the interfaceId is supported.

updatePoolKey((address,address,uint24,in.details: Update the pool key for Uniswap V4

ccipReceive((bytes32,uint64,bytes,bytes,.notice: Called by the Router to deliver a message. If this reverts, any token transfers also revert. The message will move to a FAILED state and become available for manual execution.

enterWithBone().notice: Player must own an NFT and have sufficient BONE balance

enterWithETH().notice: Player must own an NFT and send sufficient ETH

getBalance().notice: getBalance returns the native balance of the consumer contract

getLinkToken().notice: getLinkToken returns the link token contract

withdraw().notice: Allows users to withdraw their pending BONE winnings
